BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class PeriodicAgentBESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Kernel.Agent.AgentBESA
      • BESA.Kernel.Agent.PeriodicAgentBESA

  • public class PeriodicAgentBESA
extends AgentBESA
    This class represents an BESA agent which behavior is periodic.
    Since:
    JDK1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • PeriodicAgentBESA

        public PeriodicAgentBESA(java.lang.String alias,
                 StateBESA state,
                 StructBESA structAgent,
                 double passwd)
                  throws KernellAgentExceptionBESA
        Builds a periodic BESA agent. In order to construct an agent BESA is necessary to provide a structure that contains the associations between behaviors, guards and multiguards, in addition to a state in where the internal states of the agent are stored.
        Parameters:
        alias - Name of the agent with whom it will be identified in the BESA container.
        state - Internal state of the agent, which inherits of StateBESA.
        structAgent - Structure that indicates the associations between guards, multiguards and behaviors.
        passwd - Password necessary to access to the agent.
        Throws:
        KernellAgentExceptionBESA

    • Method Detail

      • shutdownAgent

        public void shutdownAgent()
        Closing routine of the agent. In this resources are freed and behaviors are stopped.
        Specified by:
        shutdownAgent in class AgentBESA

      • setupAgent

        public void setupAgent()
        Starting routine of the agent. Invoked automatically before the infinite cycle.
        Specified by:
        setupAgent in class AgentBESA
